bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV
Redline
IEEE Standard Requirements for Overhead, Pad-Mounted, Dry-Vault, and Submersible Automatic Line Sectionalizers for Alternating Current Systems Up to 38 kV - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.63-2013 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.63-2005) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required definitions, ratings, procedures for performing design tests and production tests, constructional requirements, and application considerations for overhead and padmounted, dry-vault, and submersible automatic line sectionalizers for ac systems are specified.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std C37.63-2005 (Revision of IEEE Std C37.63-1997)
